text.div:
Phenotypic Feature Type

The primary ontology class which describes the phenotype.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/hp.owl where concept descends from HP:0000118
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 404684003

name: PhenotypicFeatureType
title: Phenotypic Feature Type
publisher: Global Alliance for Genomics and Health
description: The primary ontology class which describes the phenotype.
